mapper.insert: insert into attendance( attendance_id, employee_id, attendance_start, attendance_end, attendance_out ) values( attendance_seq.nextval, '1', TO_DATE(#{attendance_start},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(#{attendance_end},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(#{attendance_out},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') )
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET attendance_out = TO_DATE(#{attendance_out},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE employee_id = 1 AND TO_CHAR(attendance_start, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
UPDATE attendance SET attendance_end = TO_DATE(#{attendance_end},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE employee_id = 1 AND TO_CHAR(attendance_start, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
